mapper.select: select no, subject, member_no,view,write_date from board
select b.member_no, m.nickname, m.no, b.subject, b.category, b.view, b.content from board b join member m on b.member_no=m.no where b.no=${no} order by b.member_no desc
mapper.delete: delete from board where no=#{param1} and member_no=#{param2}
mapper.update: update board set view=view+1 where no=#{param1}
